name: UControlRigNumericalValidationPass
doc: Used to perform a numerical comparison of the poses

bCheckControls: If set to true the pass will validate the poses of all bones
bCheckBones: If set to true the pass will validate the poses of all bones
bCheckCurves: If set to true the pass will validate the values of all curves
TranslationPrecision: The threshold under which we'll ignore a precision issue in the pass
RotationPrecision: The threshold under which we'll ignore a precision issue in the pass (in degrees)
ScalePrecision: The threshold under which we'll ignore a precision issue in the pass
CurvePrecision: The threshold under which we'll ignore a precision issue in the pass
